participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and nurturing, Emily is always eager to help others and enjoys creating a warm atmosphere around her.
participant_1.background: I working in a publishing building. I love to cook for my family and friends. People say i have a cute laugh. I am a female and love to be surrounded by males. I am still in love with my ex boyfriend.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Introverted and imaginative, Jordan prefers the world of art and fantasy to social interactions.
participant_2.background: I draw during classes instead of taking notes. I do not have many friends. I like lizards. I wish I could live in a fantasy world.

content.text: Hey there!
Hello!
What do you do for fun?
I love to draw, I draw during classes instead of taking notes.
That's really cool! I used to love to draw when I was younger.
What do you like to do now?
I love to cook, I love to cook for my family and friends.
That's awesome! I love to eat, I wish I could cook.
You should try it! It's really fun and it's a great way to relax.
I'll have to give it a try!
What do you like to do when you're not drawing?
I like to read, and I like to go for walks.
I love to read too! Do you have a favorite book?
My favorite book is the Hobbit, I love the fantasy world that Tolkien created.
I've heard good things about the Hobbit, I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a great book.
It sounds like you're a really interesting person.
I like to think so! I'm always up for trying new things.
That's awesome! I like to try new things too.
It's so nice to meet you!
You too
